title: Resource references are not supported at language level '8'
author: sungerk

comments.body: I’m not entirely clear on your question. Could you elaborate further or share a minimal reproducible demo?
This is caused by the supported version of poi, which only supports JDK 9+

title: 内置poi版本不一致导致允许报错
body:
PackagingURIHelper类中使用到 private final static POILogger _logger = POILogFactory.getLogger(PackagingURIHelper.class);
但是poi版本为5.x导致找不到该类从而抛出异常，该类应存在4.x版本中
author: Fuqiang2186

comments.body: fastExcel引入版本为1.1.0（内置的poi版本为5.2.5，poi-ooxml版本为4.1.0）
It seems like your project is using a different version of the POI library. Fastexcel, on the other hand, has already upgraded to POI 5.x.
谢谢大佬。已解决，是项目中的另一个starter依赖引入的4.x

title: excel 读取到的顺序与原excel中的顺序不一致
body: 使用  EasyExcel.read() 在extends AnalysisEventListener的监听类中 打印 读取记录，发现打印顺序与excel中的顺序不一致，请问这个应该使用什么配置/参数进行调整？使用版本1.1.0，感谢各位大佬帮忙解答
author: jiandan5997

comments.body: Could you share a minimal reproducible demo?

> 您能否分享一个最小、可重复的演示？

额……应该是我看错了，实际没有问题
Vulnerable dependencies will be upgraded in our monthly release cycle after thorough testing.

title: fix converterMap key for custome Converter

comments.body:
Kindly include a summary of changes along with the relevant test cases.

test cases has been submitted
已提交相关测试用例文件
note:Ready for next release version.

title: 【建议】关于文档和发布
body:
因为项目初期是`easyexcel`的plus版本（从中诞生），所以可否在未来的文档或发布日志中将本项目与`easyexcel.final.version`的功能进行一些比较说明。
(这样对堵住一些不愿意升级人的嘴很重要)。迫真.ing
author: LeYunone

comments.body:
With every new release, we include relevant fixes and updates. You can find the details in the project’s update.md file.

我们会在每次发布新版本时，提供相关的修复和更新日志。你可以在项目的upadte.md中查看

> With every new release, we include relevant fixes and updates. You can find the details in the project’s update.md file.
> 
> 我们会在每次发布新版本时，提供相关的修复和更新日志。你可以在项目的upadte.md中查看

好的，感谢回答。(因为在发布1.0版本中没有找到相关的说明)

title: 建议:增加excel转图片功能
body:
将excel有内容的行列转为图片,要保持原有的style

我尝试写了一套将excel转为图片,我这里一直没有完美的将excel内容转为图片,style有差异
author: JinyuZhang

comments.body: This is overly complex. Converting Excel to any format is inherently challenging. For now, we don’t have plans to implement this feature :)

title: 这个版本的poi应该怎么加载啊，文档中没看到，现在的POI已经有5.3.0了

comments.body:
Just search doc about poi.
搜索一下 poi 的使用教程就可以。

title: 从easyExcel 升级到 fastExcel 发现有一堆漏洞
author: mage1314

comments.body: We have removed all `itext` dependencies from the project. Just waiting `1.1.0` release:)

title: update:Correction of property name spelling error
body: update:Correction of property name spelling error，fountPath-> fontPath
author: CaoZhengxi

comments.body: LGTM

@CaoZhengxi While typo fixes are straightforward, I still recommend running a local build for validation. Review the specific CI build errors, address them, and then submit again.

这种typo类型的改动虽然很简单，但是还是建议在本地构建一下作为校验。查看CI构建错误的具体问题，然后再提交一下吧。

title: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: cn/idev/excel/FastExcel
body:
-Maven多模块项目 easyexcel和 fastexcel 共同存在 maven 引入成功
       
``` 
 <dependency>
            <groupId>cn.idev.excel</groupId>
            <artifactId>fastexcel</artifactId>
            <version>1.0.0</version>
        </dependency>
```
- 编译时存在 运行时找不到类
```
2024-12-10 21:02:56.291 [async-method-2] ERROR o.s.a.i.SimpleAsyncUncaughtExceptionHandler:39 - Unexpected exception occurred invoking async method: public void org.jeecg.modules.async.AsyncReport.generateReports(org.jeecg.modules.model.xml.CheckData)
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: cn/idev/excel/FastExcel
	at org.jeecg.modules.util.ReportUtils.excelToPdf(ReportUtils.java:89)
	at org.jeecg.modules.async.AsyncReport.xlsxToPdfProcess(AsyncReport.java:142)
	at org.jeecg.modules.async.AsyncReport.generateReports(AsyncReport.java:118)
	at org.jeecg.modules.async.AsyncReport$$FastClassBySpringCGLIB$$685e7b0d.invoke(<generated>)
	at org.springframework.cglib.proxy.MethodProxy.invoke(MethodProxy.java:218)
	at org.springframework.aop.framework.CglibAopProxy$CglibMethodInvocation.invokeJoinpoint(CglibAopProxy.java:771)
	at org.springframework.aop.framework.ReflectiveMethodInvocation.proceed(ReflectiveMethodInvocation.java:163)
	at org.springframework.aop.framework.CglibAopProxy$CglibMethodInvocation.proceed(CglibAopProxy.java:749)
	at org.springframework.aop.interceptor.AsyncExecutionInterceptor.lambda$invoke$0(AsyncExecutionInterceptor.java:115)
	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run$$$capture(FutureTask.java:266)
	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1149)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:624)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:750)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: cn.idev.excel.FastExcel
	at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:387)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:418)
	at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:352)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:351)
	... 14 common frames omitted

```
author: CaoZhengxi

comments.body: The issue is most likely due to a JAR conflict. I recommend focusing your troubleshooting efforts in that area.
直接排除 easyexcel 完全替换为 fastexcel 之后可以了

title: 建议增加HTML转EXCEl
body: 建议增加HTML转EXCEl，EasyPOI不能很好的处理表格样式
author: soocold

comments.body: I'm not sure it’s necessary to support this feature separately. The conversion process is too complex and broadens the tool’s intended scope.

title: itextpdf license是AGPL，不可商用，你的库license是MIT，这样是不行的吧
author: mizhousoft

comments.body:
Thank you for your interest. We’re working on systematically removing iText dependencies to fully address the AGPLv3 licensing concerns.
Your participation in this process is highly encouraged and appreciated.

感谢关注，我们正在有计划的移除itext的相关依赖。直到最后完全解决 AGPLv3 的版权问题。
我们也欢迎大家一起参与这个过程中来。
没看源码，转 pdf 使用的是 itext ？ 是否可以使用 openpdf ?

> 没看源码，转 pdf 使用的是 itext ？ 是否可以使用 openpdf ?

We’ve explored several open-source solutions, including OpenPDF, PDFBox, and x-easypdf. Unfortunately, none of them could fulfill the fundamental need for precise formatting.

这确实是个大问题，公司的blackduck根本没法扫描通过，要使用FastExcel只能把itextpdf相关的依赖全部排除，刚好没用上转pdf功能。

所以如果继续用itextpdf 的话，fastexcel能否把itextpdf的功能当作一个插件，或者一个模块，需要的单独引入不需要的就不用引用，我相信大部分人其实没有这个需求的。这样能否避免license许可的问题。

期待一个更加合理的解决方案。

> 这确实是个大问题，公司的blackduck根本没法扫描通过，要使用FastExcel只能把itextpdf相关的依赖全部排除，刚好没用上转pdf功能。
> 
> 
> 
> 所以如果继续用itextpdf 的话，fastexcel能否把itextpdf的功能当作一个插件，或者一个模块，需要的单独引入不需要的就不用引用，我相信大部分人其实没有这个需求的。这样能否避免license许可的问题。
> 
> 
> 
> 期待一个更加合理的解决方案。

We’ve planned and confirmed that the next release will remove all iText dependencies and move the PDF functionality to a separate project. This version will be released shortly.

我们已经计划并确认下一个版本会剔除所有itext的依赖并将PDF功能放到一个新的项目中。该版本会尽快发布。

title: Fixed hashCode cause StackOverflowError issue for scala3 project
author: fkong-bgl

comments.body:
I think we should add unit test cases to validate . And also verify if this is a widespread issue.

我认为我们应该增加一些单元测试用例作为校验。同时要确认这是否是个普遍的问题。

@psxjoy @CaoZhengxi @Chat2DB-Pro  
Please have look this PR,thank you

We’re still assessing the impact. Please verify the following:

1. All conflicts have been resolved.
2. The relevant branch has been added to the test module.

Also, should the corresponding hashCode method be overridden?


我们还在评估影响范围。请确认：1.已解决所有冲突；2.已经在test模块中添加对应测试用例。
另外：是否需要重写对应的hashcode方法呢？
已经不用期待了 release来了
